edu.rice.starvote

Class StatusContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rice.starvote.StatusContainer

  • public class StatusContainer
extends java.lang.Object

    Holds a ballot status value. Event handlers can be registered to objects of this class, to be executed whenever a change is made to the status. Modifications to the status are thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatusContainer()
      Constructs a new status container with an initial status of OFFLINE.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(java.util.function.Consumer<BallotStatus> task)
      Register a new event listener, which fires whenever the status is updated via writeStatus().
      BallotStatus getStatus()
      Get the currently stored status.
      void removeListeners()
      Clear all registered event listeners.
      void writeStatus(BallotStatus status)
      Modify the status.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatusContainer

        public StatusContainer()

        Constructs a new status container with an initial status of OFFLINE.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public BallotStatus getStatus()

        Get the currently stored status.

        Returns:
        Current status.

      • writeStatus

        public void writeStatus(BallotStatus status)

        Modify the status. Runs the event handlers of all registered listeners, passing to them the new status.

        Parameters:
        status - Updated status.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.util.function.Consumer<BallotStatus> task)

        Register a new event listener, which fires whenever the status is updated via writeStatus().

        Parameters:
        task - Function to be executed when the status is changed. The function takes one parameter, the updated status value.

      • removeListeners

        public void removeListeners()

        Clear all registered event listeners.
